title: PTC India to be debt free post divestment of PTC Energy to ONGC, says CMD
description: Power trading solution provider PTC India is set to achieve debt-free status after divesting its PTC Energy arm to ONGC for an enterprise value of Rs 2,021 crore. The divestment includes a Rs 925 crore bid from ONGC and over Rs 1,100 crore debt component, which will be transferred to the oil company after the transaction is completed.
